definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison

sentences.english: Results The pharmacognostic character of Herba Agriophyllum was described comprehensively.
sentences.chinese: 結果詳細描述了蒙藥材沙蓬的生藥學特徵。

sentences.english: Objective: In order to provide identifiable ground for Stevia rebaudiana on pharmaceutical botany.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲甜葉菊的生藥鑑定提供依據。

sentences.english: Lu side traffic crude drug lose money, go back township.

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the pharmacognostic character of Desmodium gangeticum( L. ) DC.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究紅母雞草的生藥鑑別特徵。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish the standard of pharmacognostic identification for the Synurus deltoides.
sentences.chinese: 建立山牛蒡生藥學鑑定標準。

sentences.english: The development of pharmacognosy is facing opportunities and challenges.
sentences.chinese: 生藥學的發展面臨着機遇和挑戰。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the identification methods for Trema rientalis(L. ) BL.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立山黃麻生藥鑑定的方法。

sentences.english: Methods By consulting Pharmacopoeia of China and Japanese Pharmacopoeia, the source of the crude drugs was compared.
sentences.chinese: 方法通過查閱中國藥典和日本藥局方，比較生藥來源。

sentences.english: The Research of Formosan Original Plants and Their Medicinal …
sentences.chinese: 阿美族的傳統生藥植物簡介。

sentences.english: Results The pharmacognosy theory systematically of Radix Rosa Davuricum was assayed for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 結果首次系統闡明瞭山刺玫根的生藥學理論。

sentences.english: The experimental results provide a scientific basis the rational use of Semen Cuscutae.
sentences.chinese: 實驗結果爲合理使用菟絲子類生藥提供了科學依據。

sentences.english: Once the task was accomplished, Goddess of Western Heaven rewarded the archer with a pill that would make him immortal.
sentences.chinese: 任務完成後，西天的上帝將給弓箭手長生藥。

sentences.english: Objective To study the pharmacognostic character of Herba Agriophylli.
sentences.chinese: 目的對蒙藥材沙蓬進行生藥學研究。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To develop the identification method of Trapa manshurica Fler.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索東北菱的生藥組織學鑑別方法。

sentences.english: Objective:To study the pharmacognosy of Pongamia pinnata(L. )Merr. Systematically.
sentences.chinese: 目的對水黃皮進行系統的生藥學研究。

sentences.english: Objective To study pharmacognosy of wild Glycyrrhiza aspera Pall.
sentences.chinese: 目的對吉爾吉斯斯坦野生粗毛甘草進行生藥學研究。
